roleset.name: put into a corral, pen
roleset.note: CORRAL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'corral' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 9.10. (from corral.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: metaphorically 'control'
example.text: But industry and OPEC officials agree that a handful of members still have enough unused capacity to glut the market and cause an oil-price collapse a few months from now if OPEC-1 doesn't soon adopt a new quota system [*-1] to corral its chronic cheaters.
